descriptionlist.description: This is a two tone monochrome theme for iOS
It may take some time to get use to the fact there's no color, but if you know where all of your icons are already then this shouldn't be too hard of a transfer.

This theme includes 215 custom icons. Most of these are simple redesigns, but others are entire overhauls. This could be a much cleaner theme, but for this being my first theme ever I believe I did pretty well.

link.name: Please consider Donateing to my PayPal if you like this theme!
